name: The Capcom Collection
summary:
The Evercade EXP features 18 built-in games from world famous publisher Capcom!
Out of the box, no download required, you’ll have access to 14 arcade greats and 4 home console classics including
Street Fighter II’: Hyper Fighting, Mega Man, Final Fight, Ghouls ‘n Ghosts, Strider, Breath of Fire (full games list below) and more including full TATE mode support!
